headline: Travelers Institute Announces Wednesdays with Woodward® Winter Webinar Schedule
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., November 05, 2025--The Travelers Institute, the public policy division of The Travelers Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TRV), today announced its Wednesdays with Woodward winter webinar schedule. The event series, hosted by Joan Woodward, President of the Travelers Institute and Executive Vice President of Public Policy at Travelers, features thought leaders from both the public and private sectors discussing topics at the intersection of insurance, business and public policy.
